АКАДЕМИЯИ МИЛЛИИ ИЛМҲОИ ТОҶИКИСТОН: NATIONAL ACADEMY OF SCIENCES OF TAJIKISTAN
ИНСТИТУТИ ОМӮЗИШИ МАСЪАЛАҲОИ ДАВЛАТҲОИ О: INSTITUTE OF STUDYING OF THE PROBLEMS OF ASIAN AND EUROPEAN COUNTRIES
Академияи миллии илмҳои ҷумҳурӣ ин оинае: The National Academy of Sciences of the Republic is a mirror that reflects the intellectual image, level of education, knowledge and civilization of our society. In human society, each nation and people is known and valued according to these indicators, i.e. degrees of intellectual development, knowledge and civilization. The cleaner and cleaner this mirror is, the brighter and more noticeable will be the spiritual image of our people and state in the world
Маҷалла дорои рақами стандартии байналха: The journal has a standard international serial number (ISSN 2790-7198)
Дар маҷалла мақолаҳою фишурдаҳои илмӣ, т: The journal publishes scientific articles, reviews and news in the field of international relations, foreign policy, world economy, language and literature of foreign countries
Нашри мақолаҳои илмӣ дар маҷавллаи «ОСИЁ: Publication of scientific articles in the journal «ASIA AND EUROPE»
Аз пажуҳишгарон, омӯзгорон, аспирантон,: Dear researchers, teachers, graduate students, undergraduates and students, we invite you to publish your scientific articles in the journal «ASIA AND EUROPE». We will deliver the results of your research to your audience
